snippet.title: NodeJS REST API: Connecting to MySQL (Ep 2)
snippet.description:
Connecting to a database with your backend server is a crucial piece of functionality that you'll need to build out. Today's lesson will show you how to use the mysql package in NodeJS and query the database for data.  Enjoy.

MySQL Getting Started: https://youtu.be/LKZYoeRfmh4
